LanguageData.Shell_HighExplosive.label: Bomba da mortaio da 81mm (HE)
LanguageData.Shell_HighExplosive.description: Low-velocity shell designed to be fired from a mortar.
LanguageData.Shell_Incendiary.label: Bomba da mortaio da 81mm (Incendiaria)
LanguageData.Shell_Incendiary.description: Low-velocity shell designed to be fired from a mortar.
LanguageData.Shell_EMP.label: Bomba da mortaio da 81mm (EMP)
LanguageData.Shell_EMP.description: Low-velocity shell designed to be fired from a mortar.
LanguageData.Shell_Firefoam.label: Bomba da mortaio da 81mm (Antincendio)
LanguageData.Shell_Firefoam.description: A pressurized shell filled with fire-extinguishing foam. Can be fired from mortars or installed as a trap. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.Shell_Smoke.label: Bomba da mortaio da 81mm (Fumogena)
LanguageData.Shell_Smoke.description: A shell that generates a cloud of smoke when detonated, obscuring incoming shots and preventing turrets from locking on. Can be fired from mortars or installed as a trap. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.Shell_AntigrainWarhead.label: Bomba da mortaio da 81mm (Anti)
LanguageData.Shell_AntigrainWarhead.description: Low-velocity shell designed to be fired from a mortar.
LanguageData.Bullet_81mmMortarShell_HE.label: Bomba da mortaio da 81mm (HE)
LanguageData.Bullet_81mmMortarShell_Incendiary.label: Bomba da mortaio da 81mm (Incendiaria)
LanguageData.Bullet_81mmMortarShell_EMP.label: Bomba da mortaio da 81mm (EMP)
LanguageData.Bullet_81mmMortarShell_FireFoam.label: Bomba da mortaio da 81mm (Antincendio)
LanguageData.Bullet_81mmMortarShell_Smoke.label: Bomba da mortaio da 81mm (Fumogena)
LanguageData.Bullet_81mmMortarShell_Antigrain.label: Bomba da mortaio da 81mm (Anti)
